world

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.Sprite
      • world.Obstacle

  • public class Obstacle
extends Sprite
    The Obstacle class is responsible for rendering immovable and collidable objects in the world.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert
